title: Why Are So Many Videos About Trafficking Going Viral on Social Media?
itunes:title: Why Are So Many Videos About Trafficking Going Viral on Social Media?
description:
Bridget Todd stops by to unpack why so many video about trafficking are going viral on social media, debunk some trafficking myths and discuss what trafficking actually looks like and why these videos are often doing more harm than good.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
